item.description:
More to come, but mark your calendars now! Figure on a great potluck meal, gifts given and gifts received, and lots of surprises

Here's what we've got so far:

Potluck: Want to bring something? Sign up on the Message Board.

Goodie-Bag Exchange: Sign ups are now closed. See the Message Board thread for reminders about how to participate.

Yankee Trader/White Elephant Swap: Sign up on the Message Board, or just bring something fun to swap.

Gift Sale Table: Got crafts, artworks or other gifts you'd like sell? Bring them and set them up where indicated. BUT let's skip the Free Stuff/Yard Sale table this time--too much other stuff going on.

Food Drive: Please bring a boxed or canned food item to donate to a local family. See the Message Board for tips on what types of food are in demand.

Swap themes: #1: Numbers. #2: Artist's Choice.

A reminder: If you arrive on the early side, please help set up. Otherwise, please help clean up. Before you take off, please ask "Is there anything else I can do?" (Also, see the list of clean-up tasks that's now in the files section and posted at the registration table.) The Meetup tends to be exhilarating and exhausting for everyone--but if we share the work, it will go quickly. Thanks!
item.how_to_find_us: Church Fellowship Hall--use door near back of parking lot

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: December 2011 NE ATC+ Monthly Meetup and Annual Holiday Party!
